popi anusmarana uthsawaye pradhana aaradhitha amuththa washayen parlimenthu kathanayaka garu karu jayasuriya mathithuma sahabhagi wu athara, sewa muktha bhata sangamaye sabhapathi brigediyar (wishramika) ke.ee gnyanawira athulu sewa muktha bhata sangam jyeshta niladharin ethuman unusum ayurin piliganna ladi.

indiya agamathiwaraya pramukha indiya rajaya wisin shri lankawa wetha laba dena sahayogaya pilibandawa siya kruthagnyathawaya pala kala agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha wyapruthi pama wima sambandhayen thamage da dadi salakillata yomu wi athi bawath, wyapruthi kadinam karalima sambandhawa sudusu piyawara ganna bawa danum di thibenawa.
shri lankawe rathnapura kalapaye rajaye pasal layisthuwa ; 15:25 . . (+3,589)  . .

jathyanthara kamituwa elidaraw karagath thawath karunak nam, trotski ghathanayata yantham dina 10 kata pasu josap hansan, esdabliwpiya ta mulumaninma nodanwa meksiko siti nagaraye eksath janapada thanapathi karyalaye efbiayi eejanthyeku samaga rahasigatha hamuwim malawak aarambha kala bawa palamu wathawata oppu karana eksath janapada aanduwe liyawili ya. “1938 di niwyok nagaraye di jipiyu eejanthayeku thamata kittu kala bawath, ohu thamata hatharawana jathyantharaya athahara thunwani jathyantharayata ekathu wana lesa ki bawath hansan efbiayi eejantha robat mak gregar ta ema pa්rathama hamuwedi ma danum duni.
meka diyunu wenna wenna pahasu wenne kelam karayantayi oopa dupa hoyana untayi thama.
ese nathinam ee atharata yamak thabima ho thira reddak dama pitupasa janelaya penima walakalima anek kramayayi.
diyata bata tharunayan atadena diyakeli thutin sanaheddi ma ee athurin sada jala paharata asu wuye waidya shishya pinsaraya.
oba atha nosoda biththaraya sakasima 3.
age ruwa dutuwa sanin oba mathakayata nangenne sara teli sithuwame aya nirupanaya kala charithayayi.
